definition: outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting

sentences.english: If it is fine tomorrow, we'll go hiking.
sentences.chinese: 如果明天天气好的话，我们去野游。

sentences.english: The success of the picnic will be dependent on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 这次野游是否成功取决于天气。

sentences.english: Those boys and girls who wanted to go hiking were very joyful.
sentences.chinese: 想去野游的同学们都非常高兴。

sentences.english: It was to be a picnic on a gigantic scale.
sentences.chinese: 这将是一次规模盛大的野游。

sentences.english: Those boys and girls, who wanted to go hiking, were very joyful.
sentences.chinese: 那些同学很高兴，他们要去野游。

definition: to cook a meal over a campfire (usu. for a group of people on an outing)/cookout
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
to go for a hike in spring
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
to spend the summer/to take a summer vacation
